briefTitle: The Effects of Wheat Sprouts Supplements on the Key Health Indicators of the Patients With Breast Cancer After Chemotherapy
officialTitle: The Effects of Wheat Sprouts Supplements on the Key Health Indicators of the Patients With Breast Cancer After Chemotherapy
conditions: Nutritional Status, Immune Function, Quality of Life Uring the Progress of Chemotherapy
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

- patients diagnosed with breast cancer, receiving chemotherapy for the first time

Exclusion Criteria:

- Patients with severe liver or kidney disease or other infectious diseases
